column3:
The higher the duck's level, the greater its power
+1 to the main characteristic for every 5 levels
+1 to the secondary characteristic for every 10 levels
+1 to the rest of the stats for every 20 levels

Chemistry affects the strength of certain skills 
+1 for a duck of the same race
+1 for a covenant of the same color
+1 for the same covenant
Strength makes you less likely to get hit and makes your hits hurt more
Ducks from the same covenant receive +2 [chemistry] points. +1 if only the color matches
